name: Watering Imperium
description:
Story:

The imperium needs water for the homeworld, you "bob" have been sent to the lush planet "H to O" to collect as much as robotically possible. 

Mechanics:

You control your robot sorta like a plane/helicopter, collect enough water from water pools and clouds. Maybe the planet "H to O" will die from this, but who cares? Kappa
